kodkod.core.fol2sat
Class BooleanFormulaAllocator

java.lang.Object
  kodkod.core.fol2sat.BooleanFormulaAllocator

public abstract class BooleanFormulaAllocator
extends java.lang.Object

Allocates boolean formulas to relations. A formula allocated to a relation indicates the presence/absence of a particular tuple in the relations' bounds. All allocated formulas are produced using the same circuit factory. All calls to allocate(Relation) allocate variables to the argument relation using the same bounding information.

Author:
Emina Torlak
specfield:
relations: set Relation
factory: BooleanFactory
formulas: relations lone->one BooleanMatrix
invariant:
formulas[Relation].factory = factory

Method Summary
abstract  BooleanMatrix allocate(Relation r)
          Returns a matrix m of boolean formulas representing the specified relation.
abstract  BooleanFactory factory()
          Returns the factory used to generate formulas by this allocator.

this.fatory

allocate

public abstract BooleanMatrix allocate(Relation r)
Returns a matrix m of boolean formulas representing the specified relation.

Returns:
{m : BooleanMatrix | m.zero = BooleanConstant.FALSE && m.elements[int] in this.factory }
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - - r = null
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - - the bounding object used by this allocator has no bounds for r
